code: import React from"react";import"../styles/components-style/Dropdown.css";import arrow from"../assets/arrowDropdown.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dropdown(_ref){var title=_ref.title,text=_ref.text;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"containerValue",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"valueTitle",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrowIcon",onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{"data-name":title,src:arrow,alt:"fleche de dropdown"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"descriptionValue","data-textname":title,children:text.map(function(element,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"valueText",children:element},title+index);})})]});}function handleClick(e){var arrow=e.target;arrow.classList.toggle('activeArrowIcon');var textAppear=document.getElementsByClassName('descriptionValue');for(var i=0;i<textAppear.length;i++){if(arrow.dataset.name===textAppear[i].dataset.textname){textAppear[i].classList.toggle('notHidden');}}}export default Dropdown;
